item.title: CVE-2024-24845|2024-03-16T04:29:23.262Z -- Sewpafly -- Post Thumbnail Editor
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Sewpafly Post Thumbnail Editor.This issue affects Post Thumbnail Editor: from n/a through 2.4.8.
